= Install =

  # Copy the plugin in the _vendor/plugin_ directory
  # Create a file named _simplyglobal.rb_ in the _config/initializers_ directory
  # Create a `hash` of language
{{{
# franÃ§ais
fr = {
    "hi" => "bonjour",
    "welcome" => "bienvenue"  
}
}}}
  # Add the language `hash` to the object
{{{

}}}
